data.title: Xtreme Adventure Park Raleigh-Durham
data.meta_description: Xtreme Park Adventures is located in the heart of the Triangle in North Carolina. We have paintball, lasertag, escape rooms, and much more.
data.text:
New Event!

Art Of War – Act IV

October 5th – 8 AM to 5:30 PM

An Xtreme Kombat & Team Venom All Day Paintball Event

One of the most intense paintball games of the year! 2 factions fighting for control. Featuring some of the biggest names in scenario paintball on the east coast!

Supplemental Soccer Training for your Kids!

Supplement your child’s soccer training with group training classes every Monday. Our dedicated coach Cesar (current UPSL player) will focus on developing the player’s fundamental soccer skills, teamwork, and sportsmanship in a fun and supportive environment.

All skill levels are welcome. The NC Soccer field is turf and has field lights. Please bring water, a ball, and keeper gloves (if your child is a goalie). All other training equipment is provided.

Gift Cards

Looking for the perfect gift for your kids, grandsons or your girlfriend? - WE HAVE GIFT CARDS

You can pick them up at our park or we can Mail you one!
